Text: I'm having problems seeding. Please attempt to peer download as I fix things. I will get this thing to work!

SEEDING at about 80k/s now. Get your downloads happening now. This is an amazing film. Brutally real. I've been in these houses, and it is almost exactly the true situation. This is a very real story about addiction recovery.

I made a YouTube video of the opening sequence. It gives a good intro. I is mostly dark, but the movie has a lot of fun and laughs, as well as plenty of hope.

Go to youtube an search for "Opening Sequence - Never Get Outta The Boat" uploaded by gleeper. If you like the intro on youtube you will like the movie.

I am trying to download this now. If it takes me a month to get this movie, so be it. I've searched for it before with no luck so I thank you, so much, so so so much, for uploading this. I'm in recovery and my counselor was talking about us watching a movie and most movies I suggested she didn't want us to see so I've been wanting to see this and let her know about it. Again, thank you for the upload, gleep. If I like it, which I'm sure I will judging by the trailer, this will remain on my comp for awhile so I'll be seeding for awhile.

Just watched it. Great movie! Thanks again, gleep! I'll be seeding this for a long time.
